懶人包：必買神作。

單人模式劇情接續1代，完整的把一切事情原委明交代(或暗示)清楚，最讓人糾結的是...角色設定真的好讚阿，就連反派都很難讓人討厭(尤其是機槍塔，太萌了!!!!!)

雙人合作模式的劇情其實也牽扯到了主線劇情，找個好基友一起天馬行空的破關燒燒腦細胞吧

單就整體遊戲時數來說真的不長(應該說看玩家和你隊友的表現囉)，回頭率也普普，但是完整的遊玩一次後絕對不會後悔!!!
Одни словом игра просто ахуена!!!
Mind = BLOWN!! worth my money
My head hurts from puzzle solving. WORTH IT!!!!

The cake is a lie

Portal is one of those special franchises. One in a million. It twists your brain while enriching it at the same time. 
If I am to be honest, I love all the characters. None of them are basic, and they're all their own characters, not the personified robotic shell of their voice actor. Just when you think it's over, bam! Not over. More storyline and plot business to go! If you want a good game, I suggest the first Portal and this game. They're the first of their kind. It's much more than a puzzle game. 10/10. In the near future I hope to see a VR Portal 3 or spinoff. Nonetheless, I want to know more about things that were only touched on the surface of in this game.
(P.S. The cake is a lie.)

與一代同樣為兩種顏色傳送門構成的遊戲，劇情依然有趣。
但與一代不同的是似乎有兩種結局?(我還沒破第二個選擇)，也或許只是過程上產生變化。
謎題上面有加強的感覺，讓我偷偷Google了兩次(掩面。(當然，我變笨也是有可能的w)
Ending song 依然好聽。對於結局甚至會產生"恩...好想知道後面還發生了什麼事"之類的想法。
對於喜歡解謎又喜歡劇情的人算是不可錯過的作品吧。
虽然玩的头晕，但还是沉迷其中无法自拔

Portal 2 è un gioco geniale , sa darti grande soddisfazione quando risolvi uno dei suoi puzzle soprattutto quando incominciano a farsi più complicati...Consigliato anche a chi come me non è amante di questo genere di giochi .

Thought provoking puzzles, beautiful physics engine, co-operative (or counter-operative, depending on your playstyle!) gameplay, and Sass Master Glados. What more could you ask? 

Graphically the game is presented exactly as advertised: You're a robotic test subject in a test lab, testing things. Which would normally lend itself to some stark and boring visuals, and at times they do have a bit of chronic same-face, but it fits well. Right up until the point where you're thrown a massive curveball and suddenly all the sterile white surfaces become a thing of the past. 

Audio? Who doesn't like a little friendly (or unfriendly) spurring from the robotic overlord insighting a bit of friendly competition between you and your co-op partner? The dialogue is as funny as you'd expect and no matter how good of friends you are (my co-op partner and I have been friends for twenty years now), Glados seems to find just the right buttons to push to inspire a few rib-jabs between you. 

The storyline leaves a bit to be desired thus far, but then again we haven't actually finished the game yet - so I'll reserve my thoughts on that for another day. 

If you haven't played it yet, you should! Find a friend though. It'll make it that much more rewarding :D

*This game is 6 years old and I dont really need to review it, but I'd like to recommend it so I'll give some thoughts I've had: 

When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
